resources.string: App/Activity/ activity Hello World 例子
你如何使用实例 Theme.Dialog主题进行，看起来像一个活动 对话。它也有很多的文字来说明如何文本换行（和 相应窗口的大小调整）可以在对话发生。
你如何使用实例 定制Theme.Dialog主题进行，看起来像一个活动 自定义对话框，在这里有一个丑陋的框架。
演示可用屏幕 定位模式。通常你要设置所需的模式在你的清单 而不是编程。
你如何做出了榜样 活动有一个半透明的背景下，在合成 无论是它的后面。
App/Activity/Translucent Blur 半透明 背景模糊activity
Press a button to launch an activity with a custom animation.按一个按钮来使用自定义启动一个活动 动画。
App/Activity/Save & Restore State保存 ＆;恢复状态
Demonstration of saving and restoring activity state in 节能示范和恢复活动状态 onSaveInstanceState() and onCreate().
该文本字段保存它的状态：This text field saves its state:
该文本字段不保存它的状态：This text field does not save its state:
App/Activity/Soft Input Modes软键盘输入的模式
显示了如何不同的软输入方式的影响 应用，由于到输入法调整。
This is a part of the application\'s UI that can resize to adjust for the IME.这是一个可以调整调整为一次应用程序\的用户界面的一部分。
Text editor.\n\nTap to show the IME, which will cause this window to resize as requested.文本编辑器。\ n\ n轻触来显示图像，这将导致调整该窗口的要求。
Demonstration of persistent activity state with持续性活动状态的示范 getPreferences(0).edit() and getPreferences(0).
重新创建示范活动，有 它与重建新显著的变化。在这种情况下，主题改变。
App/Activity/Receive Result -- Activity 之间的数据传递交互
选择一个结果发送，或BACK取消。
按按钮前进到下一个活动。这项活动 会停止，所以你不会再看到它回来的时候。Press the button to go forward to the next activity. This activity will stop, so you will no longer see it when going back.
按后退按钮并注意我们没有看到前面的活动。Press back button and notice we don\'t see the previous activity.
按下按钮，启动例子。接下来的活动将 有条件地重定向到另一个活动从用户收集数据。 Press the button to start the example. The next activity will conditionally redirect to another activity to collect data from the user.
您现在看到的主要活动，因为用户正常运行 文本已被设置为： You now see the main activity running normally because the user text has been set to:
输入将由主要活动中使用的文字。按返回 取消。Enter the text that will be used by the main activity. Press back to cancel.

本活动演示了如何使用 介绍和DISPLAYMANAGER显示其他内容的显示。
 尝试连接一个辅助显示，看会发生什么。
 选择显示打开就可以了演示。 This activity demonstrates how to use a Presentation and the DisplayManager to show content on other Displays.
 Try connecting a secondary display and watch what happens.
 Selecting a Display will open a Presentation on it.
显示上展出＃％2 $ d张照片＃％1 $ D：％3$ S。Showing photo #%1$d on display #%2$d: %3$s.
App/Activity/Presentation with Media Router-Activity介绍与媒体路由器

本活动演示了如何 自动使用演示和MediaRouter到 可用时基于当前显示在副显示器上的内容 所选的媒体路线。\n 尝试连接一个辅助显示，看会发生什么。This activity demonstrates how to use a Presentation and the MediaRouter to automatically show content on a secondary display when available based on the currently selected media route.\n Try connecting a secondary display and watch what happens.
现在玩主显示器上 \“％S\'。Now playing on main display \'%s\'.
现在玩中学 显示\'％s的\'。Now playing on secondary display \'%s\'.
App/Activity/Secure Surfaces安全页面不允许截屏/Secure Window安全窗口，不允许截屏

本活动演示了如何创建活动 使用安全的表面，其内容只能在安全显示可见。 活动\的窗口已经被打上FLAG_SECURE，使之使用安全的表面上。 因此，活动的内容将不会出现在屏幕截图并不会 镜像到非安全的显示器。
 
 我是一个安全的活动！This activity demonstrates how to make an activity use a secure surface so that its contents will only be visible on secure displays. The activity's window has been marked with FLAG_SECURE to make it use a secure surface. Consequently, the contents of the activity will not appear in screenshots and will not be mirrored to non-secure displays.
 
 I am a secure activity!
App/Activity/Secure Surfaces安全页面不允许截屏/Secure Dialog安全对话框

本活动演示了如何创建一个对话框使用 一个安全的表面，其内容只能在安全显示可见。 对话框\的窗口已经被打上FLAG_SECURE，使之使用安全的表面上。 因此，对话的内容将不会出现在屏幕截图并不会 镜像到非安全的显示器。This activity demonstrates how to make a dialog use a secure surface so that its contents will only be visible on secure displays. The dialog\'s window has been marked with FLAG_SECURE to make it use a secure surface. Consequently, the contents of the dialog will not appear in screenshots and will not be mirrored to non-secure displays.
显示安全对话Show secure dialog
我是一个安全的对话！I am a secure dialog!
App/Activity/Secure Surfaces安全页面不允许截屏/Secure Surface View安全的显示View

本次活动展示了如何使 SurfaceView使用安全表面，使得它的内容将只对可见 安全的显示器。 表面视图\的窗口已取得安全使用setSecure（真），使其使用 一个安全的表面。因此，表面视图的内容将不会出现在 屏幕截图和将不被镜像到非安全的显示器。This activity demonstrates how to make a SurfaceView use a secure surface so that its contents will only be visible on secure displays. The surface view\'s window has been made secure using setSecure(true) to make it use a secure surface. Consequently, the contents of the surface view will not appear in screenshots and will not be mirrored to non-secure displays.
演示接受参数片段 在运行时（右），或从属性在布局（左）包。Demonstrates a fragment that takes arguments as a Bundle at runtime (on the right) or from attributes in a layout (on the left).
演示两个嵌入式片段是实例化的参数。Demonstrates two embedded fragments that are instantiated with arguments.
App/Fragment/Custom Animations片段压栈自定义动画
App/Fragment/Hide and Show片段显示隐藏
片段填充背景 菜单;长按按钮来查看。Fragment populating a context menu; long press the button to see.
App/Fragment/Dialog or Activity片段对话框或activity
演示同一片段 被示出为一个对话和嵌入的活性的内侧。Demonstrates the same fragment being shown as a dialog and embedded inside of an activity.
片段嵌入到 活性：Fragment embedded inside of the activity:
从两个片段构建菜单，允许 你隐藏他们删除他们..Build menus from two fragments, allowing you to hide them to remove them..
显示片段1菜单Show fragment 1 menu
显示片段2菜单Show fragment 2 menu
长按点击右键菜单Long click for context menu
本地服务已启动Local service has started
本地服务已停止Local service has stopped
本地服务例子Sample Local Service
App/Service/Local Service Controller-Activity的本地服务控制器
这说明如何实现持续性 可以启动并根据需要停止。 This demonstrates how you can implement persistentservices that may be started and stopped as desired.

这表明你怎么可以用一个持续连接 服务。请注意如何它会自动启动为您，并且玩的 这和本地服务控制器之间的交互。 This demonstrates how you can connect with a persistent service. Notice how it automatically starts for you, and play around with the interaction between this and Local Service Controller.
连接到本地服务Connected to local service
从本地服务断开Disconnected from local service
这表明你如何与沟通 使用Messenger的远程服务。This demonstrates how you can communicate with a remote service using Messenger.
远程服务已启动Remote service has started
远程服务已停止Remote service has stopped
示例远程服务Sample Remote Service
App/Service/Remote Service Controller远程服务控制
这说明如何实现持续性 服务于一个单独的进程可以被启动，并根据需要停止运行。This demonstrates how you can implement persistent services running in a separate process that may be started and stopped as desired.
App/Service/Remote Service Binding远程服务绑定控制

这表明你怎么可以用一个持续连接 服务于另一个进程中运行。使用kill按钮来查看时，会发生什么 该进程崩溃。This demonstrates how you can connect with a persistent service running in another process. Use the kill button to see what happens when the process crashes.
连接到远程服务Connected to remote service
从远程服务断开Disconnected from remote service
解除绑定由于断开Unbinding due to disconnect
失败调用远程服务Failure calling remote service
App/Service/Remote Service Binding Options远程服务绑定选项
示例服务启动参数Sample Service Start Arguments
App/Service/Service Start Arguments Controller服务启动参数控制器
这表明如何 服务可以带参数启动，并运行，直到所有参数都 处理。\n This demonstrates how service can be started with arguments, and run until all arguments are processed.
启动Start \"One\" 没有重新提交no redeliver
启动Start \"Two\" 没有重新提交no redeliver
开始传递失败Start failed delivery
服务是在前台Service is in the foreground
样品前景服务Sample Foreground Service
App/Service/Foreground Service Controller前台服务控制器
这表明，你怎么能 落实在需要的时候在前台运行的服务。This demonstrates how you can implement services that run in the foreground when needed.
启动前台服务Start Service Foreground
启动后台服务Start Service Background
App/Service/Isolated Service Controller-隔离服务控制器

这证明了采用Android的：isolatedProcess 提供服务。有两种服务，其中可以独立地控制; 他们会 在自己独立的进程每次运行This demonstrates the use of android:isolatedProcess with services. There are two services, which can be independently controlled; they will each run in their own isolated process
隔离服务1已开始Isolated service 1 has started
隔离服务1已停止Isolated service 1 has stopped
例子中分离服务1Sample Isolated Service 1
的一次性闹钟已经熄灭The one-shot alarm has gone off
的重复闹钟已经熄灭The repeating alarm has gone off
这表明如何安排和处理 一次性和重复报警。This demonstrates how to schedule and handle one-shot and repeating alarms.
开始重复报警Start Repeating Alarm
停止重复报警Stop Repeating Alarm
一次性闹钟会根据30秒熄灭 实时时钟。尝试在此之前改变当前的时间！One-shot alarm will go off in 30 seconds based on the real time clock. Try changing the current time before then!
重复报警器将在15秒熄灭，每15秒的基础上经过的实时时钟后 Repeating alarm will go off in 15 seconds and every 15 seconds after based on the elapsed realtime clock
重复报警已不定期Repeating alarm has been unscheduled
报警服务已开始运行The alarm service has started running
报警服务已经运行完毕The alarm service has finished running
例子报警服务Sample Alarm Service
这表明如何安排重复 报警，将通过服务发起长寿命操作。This demonstrates how to schedule a repeating alarm that will initiate a long-lived operation through a service.
启动报警服务 Start Alarm Service
停止报警服务Stop Alarm Service
报警服务将立即运行，然后每 30秒15秒Alarm service will run now, and then every 30 seconds for 15 seconds
报警服务已改期Alarm service has been unscheduled

这表明，对运行一个仪表 我们自己的类之一。请注意，此活动将被打死 在其自己的应用程序启动的仪器的一个副作用。This demonstrates an Instrumentation that runs against one of our own classes. Note that this activity will be killed as a side-effect of starting instrumentation on its own application.
这表明一个仪器包 启动联系人列表，并模拟用户的事件进行过滤。This demonstrates an Instrumentation package that launches the contacts list and simulates user events to filter it.
这是一个长期的通知。你看，你可能需要第二 更多阅读。This is a long notification. See, you might need a second more to read it.
这项服务将更新状态栏通知 每5秒钟一分钟This service will update a status bar notification every 5 seconds for a minute

这是第四活动序列。上的一个按钮 第四将使用Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_REORDER_TO_FRONT标志带来的第二 的活动历史堆栈的前面。在此之后，通过继续进行回 历史应该与新最前面的第二重排序活动开始，然后是四， 第三和最后的第一个。This is the first of a sequence of four Activities. A button on the fourth will use the Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_REORDER_TO_FRONT flag to bring the second of the activities to the front of the history stack. After that, proceeding back through the history should begin with the newly-frontmost second reorder activity, then the fourth, the third, and finally the first.
进入第二Go to the second
这是在四个活动的序列的第二This is the second in a sequence of four Activities.
进入第三Go to the third
这是四个活动序列的三分之一。This is the third of a sequence of four Activities.
进入第四Go to the fourth
这是最后的四个活动的序列This is the last in a sequence of four Activities.
带来正面第二Bring the second in front
App/Menu-菜单/Inflate from XML以XML方式，设置菜单
选择一个菜单资源，然后按菜单 键。Select a menu resource and press the menu key.
如果你想选择其他菜单资源， 回去重新运行该活动。If you want to choose another menu resource, go back and re-run this activity.
语音搜索的设置Voice Search in Settings
API演示已更新！ApiDemos has been updated!
从资源初始化：Initialized from a resource:

平原Plain,粗体bold,斜体italic,
粗体斜体bold-italic
TextView中使用默认控制-Z撤销的行为。TextView with the default Control-Z undo behavior.
TextView中具有撤销禁用。TextView with undo disabled.
TextView中有长度限制输入过滤。TextView with a length limit InputFilter.
用TextWatcher文本信用卡输入字段。Credit card input field with a TextWatcher.

演示如何编写布局 资源引用，这样就可以定义多种不同配置 引用一个实际的XML定义的布局的资源。Shows how to write layout resource references, so that you can define multiple different configurations of a layout resource that refer to one actual XML definition.
使用下面的-wNNNdp布局和 -hNNNdp根据屏幕的大小不同的版本之间进行选择。The layouts below use -wNNNdp and -hNNNdp to select between different versions based on the size of the screen.
下面使用-swNNNdp布局 根据屏幕的大小不同的版本之间进行选择。The layouts below use -swNNNdp to select between different versions based on the size of the screen.
调用联系人挑选各种 联系人数据。这些都不需要调用者持有 READ_CONTACTS许可。Invoke Contacts to pick various kinds of contact data. None of these require that the caller hold the READ_CONTACTS permission.
选择一个联系人Pick a Contact
选择一个电话Pick a Phone
选择一个地址Pick an Address
通过授予访问共享应用程序的私有数据 在其内容提供商特定的URI。Share private data of the app by granting access to a specific URI in its content provider.
开展各种意图的例子。Example of launching various Intents.
使用各种意图的活动标志的例子。Example of the use of various intent activity flags.
图标和滚动字幕Icons and marquee
使用远程视图的气球Use remote views in balloon
使用默认值适用Use default values where applicable
白色，无标题老样式对话框
带标题的长文本对话框
带标题，超长消息对话框

中东至少经常Middle least often
首先至少经常First least often
Preference/5. Preferences from code从代码中首
计数器的值是The counter value is
基于对话框的喜好-Dialog-based preferences
这是一个复选框-This is a checkbox
这是一个开关This is a switch
这是自定义文本的开关This is a switch with custom text
是或否偏好Yes or no preference
使用一个是/否对话框的例子An example that uses a yes/no dialog
你喜欢吃香蕉Do you like bananas?
编辑文本首选Edit text preference
使用一个EditText对话的例子-An example that uses an edit text dialog
输入您最喜欢的动物Enter your favorite animal
使用一个列表对话框的例子An example that uses a list dialog
显示喜好的另一个屏幕Shows another screen of preferences
显示喜好的另一片段Shows another fragment of preferences
偏好那就是下一个屏幕上，但在同一层次Preference that is on the next screen but same hierarchy
从意向启动一个Activity-Launches an Activity from an Intent
这是一个自定义计数器偏好This is a custom counter preference
家长复选框偏好Parent checkbox preference
这是视觉上的父This is visually a parent
子复选框偏好Child checkbox preference

这项活动表明，当检测到它可能遮蔽视图 被其他窗口。 This activity demonstrates a view that detects when it is potentially obscured by other windows.
弹出，这将覆盖敬酒，并在一个贫穷的企图愚弄掩盖这一窗口 你去点击大红色按钮。唐\'吨做到这一点！ Pop up a toast that will overlay and obscure this window in a poor attempt to fool you into clicking the big red buttons. Don\'t do it!
该按钮无过滤。此按钮仍然会照常工作，而 面包是可见的，被欺骗的看法。 小心！ This button does no filtering. This button will still work as usual while the toast is visible and is spoofing the view. Careful!
内置过滤演示Built-in filtering demo:

这个按钮使用由框架提供的内置的安全触摸滤波 使用了android：filterTouchesWhenObscured属性。该按钮将无法使用 而举杯可见。 This button uses the built-in secure touch filtering provided by the framework using the android:filterTouchesWhenObscured attribute. This button will be inoperable while the toast is visible.
自定义过滤演示Custom filtering demo:

此按钮过滤器倒是采用了触摸监听器来检查MotionEvent标志 并警告用户。如果在触及该按钮将显示一条消息 敬酒是可见的。 This button filters touches using a touch listener to examine the MotionEvent flags and warns the user. This button will display a message if touched while the toast is visible.
要\'t单击！它\'会花费你！Don\'t click! It\'ll cost you!
小心！似乎有另一个窗口部分遮住这个窗口... 一些难堪HORRIBLE可能发生。 Careful! There appears to be another window partly obscuring this window... Something unutterably HORRIBLE might have happened.
干杯！干杯！A toast! A toast!
完全安全的，相信我... Totally safe, trust me...
想起企鹅Think of the penguins!

本活动演示了如何处理从接收到的输入事件 游戏控制器。现在请连接您的游戏控制器，并尝试 移动操纵杆或按按钮。如果有帮助，试着想象 你是在紧追谁绑架外国人的一个孤独的太空牛仔 在他们的方式回到仙女座你最喜欢的骆驼......This activity demonstrates how to process input events received from game controllers. Please connect your game controller now and try moving the joysticks or pressing buttons. If it helps, try to imagine that you are a lone space cowboy in hot pursuit of the aliens who kidnapped your favorite llama on their way back to Andromeda...

本活动演示如何处理与View.onHoverEvent悬停事件， ViewGroup.onInterceptHoverEvent和View.setOnHoverListener。 This activity demonstrates how to handle hover events with View.onHoverEvent, ViewGroup.onInterceptHoverEvent, and View.setOnHoverListener.
使容器拦截悬停事件Make container intercept hover events

在（％1 $ F，％2 $ F）退出容器。指针可以是 子的边界，而不是内部。Exited the container at (%1$f,%2$f). The pointer may be inside the bounds of a child instead.

文本1：各种 数据，就可以自动连接的。 的 在 本文有一些事情是可行的。 例如， 你可以点击http://www.google.com，它将启动 网页浏览器。您可以在google.com上点击了。 如果你 点击（415）555-1212，应该拨打的电话。或只写 foobar@example.com一个电子邮件链接。如果你有一个像URI http://www.example.com/lala/foobar@example.com你应该得到的 完整链接不是电子邮件地址。或者你可以把一个位置 像1600剧场百汇，山景城，CA94043总结： https://www.google.com，或650-253-0000，somebody@example.com， 或9606莫帕克北高速公路，400室，奥斯汀，德克萨斯州78759。 text1: Various kinds of data that will be auto-linked.
In this text are some things that are actionable. For instance, you can click on http://www.google.com and it will launch the web browser. You can click on google.com too. If you click on (415) 555-1212 it should dial the phone. Or just write foobar@example.com for an e-mail link. If you have a URI like http://www.example.com/lala/foobar@example.com you should get the full link not the e-mail address. Or you can put a location like 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043. To summarize: https://www.google.com, or 650-253-0000, somebody@example.com, or 9606 North MoPac Expressway, Suite 400, Austin, TX 78759.

文本2：使用＆LT明确的联系; A＆GT;标记。的 这有标记的 链接 指定 通过＆LT; A＆GT; 标签。使用\“电话：\”URL 来拨打电话号码 text2: Explicit links using <a> markup. This has markup for a link specified via an <a> tag. Use a \"tel:\" URL todial a phone number.
显示不确定无标题Show Indeterminate No Title

旋转褪色或jumpcut更改默认旋转动画。 仅当FLAG_FULLSCREEN设置工作，并且没有对话框上。 试着用和不用关机对话框中可见旋转。 Change the default rotation animation from rotating to fade or jumpcut. Only works if FLAG_FULLSCREEN is set and there are no dialogs up. Try rotating with and without the Power Off dialog visible.

The Android platform is a software stack for mobile devices including an operating system, middleware and key applications. Developers can create applications for the platform using the Android SDK. Applications are written using the Java programming language and run on Dalvik, a custom virtual machine designed for embedded use which runs on top of a Linux kernel.
If you want to know how to develop applications for Android, you\'re in the right place. This site provides a variety of documentation that will help you learn about Android and develop mobile applications for the platform.
An early look at the the Android SDK is also available. It includes sample projects with source code, development tools, an emulator, and of course all the libraries you\'ll need to build an Android application. What would it take to build a better mobile phone?

Accessibility无障碍服务/Accessibility Service-无障碍服务

1.启用话语提示（设置 - >辅助功能 - >话语提示）。 

 2。启用探索按触按（设置 - >辅助功能 - >触摸浏览）。 

 3。触摸探索时钟应用程序和主屏幕。 

 4。进入时钟应用程序并更改警报的时间。 

 5。启用ClockBack（设置 - >辅助功能 - > ClockBack）。 

 6。进入时钟应用程序并更改警报。 

 7。设置的铃声振动模式并更改警报。 

 8。设置的铃声为静音模式，并改变报警。

尝试在另一个选择一些文本 应用程序，并在其选择菜单选项列表中找到这个程序\'的名字。Try selecting some text in another app and find this app\'s name in the list of options for its selection menu.
选择文本处理Select text to process

此框中选择一段文字来触发 文本选择操作模式。在那里，你会发现\“ApiDemos\”。这是因为这个应用程序 宣称它可以处理文字处理意向。请尝试选择的行动派 所选的文字，这些活动和检索处理的文本回来。Select a piece of text from this box to trigger the text selection action mode. In there, you will find \"ApiDemos\". That is because this app declares it can handle text processing intents. Try selecting that action to send the selected text to that activity and retrieve processed text back.
